context.p: You can evaluate the program for free during 30 days before purchasing a Subscription Key. All features are enabled during the evaluation period.

step.cmd: When you start the program for the first time, the following dialog appears:
If your computer uses a proxy server to connect to the Internet, follow these steps to configure the proxy server settings:

substep.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Proxy Settings dialog

substep.cmd: Type the proxy server name or IP in the Server text box.
Type the proxy port number in the Port text box.
If your proxy server requires authentication, type the proxy user name in the User ID text box and the corresponding password in the Password text box.
Click the Save Proxy Settings button.
substep.stepresult: Selected proxy settings are saved and the dialog closes.

step.cmd: Click the Request Evaluation Key button.
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Request Evaluation Key dialog

step.cmd: Type your first name in the First Name text box.
Type your last name in the Last Name text box.
Enter your company name in the Company text box. This step is optional.
Type your email address in the Email text box.
Enter again your email address in the Repeat Email text box.
Click the Request Evaluation Key button.
step.stepresult: Your evaluation subscription request is sent to the Registration Server. An email with an evaluation subscription key will be immediately sent to the indicated email address. Request Received dialog

step.cmd: Check your email and note the new evaluation subscription key. Check your spam filter if you don't receive an email with the evaluation subscription key within a few minutes.
Enter the evaluation subscription in the Subscription Key text box of the Subscription Management dialog.

taskbody.result: Your computer is enabled to work with the application for 30 days.
